sentences.sContent: A car is useless without gasolene.
Equiped with gasolene changeover gear and shuttle worktable ensure the stamping quality.
sentences.sContent_eng: Equiped with gasolene changeover gear and shuttle worktable ensure the stamping quality.
sentences.sCn: 使用气油转换装置，梭动工作台带动工件平稳旋转烫印，烫印质量稳定。
